entry.title: Contemporary Documentation
entry.summary:
Description

Juha-Matti aka Juhis is a developer community builder, web developer and programming teacher from Helsinki, Finland. He's passionate about building diverse and welcoming communities, board games and having discussions about technology. Currently he is working at Futurice in Helsinki helping developers become better versions of themselves. In his free time, he loves to tinker with Python building small scripts to automate the manual bits of his life and building Pokemon related web applications.

Get tickets for PyCon Estonia 2020 - https://bit.ly/pycon2020

Python is nearing 3 decades in existence (yes, kinda hard to believe). Where do we go from here? We have the same question, hence PyCon 2019 will be a peek into the future of Python. Come, hang out with an inspired crowd, have rich, direct conversations and who knows, maybe youâ€™ll even find an answer.

https://pycon.ee https://twitter.com/PyConEstonia https://www.facebook.com/events/vaba-lava/pycon-estonia-2019/318811955508926/

entry.title: Data scraping for beginners
entry.summary:
Description

Data scraping for beginners by Juha-Matti Santala

The Internet is full of data but it's not always easily obtainable in a format that is analyzable or presented in an optimal way. Data scraping - pulling data from websites - gives you access to a whole new world of working with data.

In my talk I'll go through the basics of data scraping in Python using a popular BeautifulSoup library.

About the author: Juha-Matti Santala is a full-stack web developer, community manager and education enthusiast who has worked as a developer in startups both in Silicon Valley and in Helsinki. Now he works as a community manager in Boost Turku helping young entrepreneurs with their ventures.
